game.name: Twilight Survivors
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: rogue-lite 요소와 귀여운 아트 스타일을 결합한 생존 게임입니다! 세상이 어둠에 빠져 당신만이 유일한 희망의 빛입니다. 버텨낼 수 있을까요? 아니면 여러 번의 죽음을 맞이할까요? 더 많은 코인을 모아 자신을 강화하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A time-limited survival game infused with rogue-lite elements and an adorable art style! The world has plunged into darkness, and you are its sole beacon of hope. Will you endure until dawn, or succumb to repeated deaths in your quest? Fear not, for you can collect more coins to arm yourself!

reviewHighlights.text: + Low price + Cute character + Card build + Skill can be evolved
For that price You wont find better game. Lots of things to do
